column4: in winblows i can hold alt and key an ascii value and when I release alt it will insert that char.  Is there a way to do this in linux?
yes, in fact, you can even switch your keyboard layout whenever you want to different languages.... system -> preferences -> keybaord layout for your options
i use ascii chars that are not typically mapped to a key. (i.e. ASCII 146)
you can set a special key (forgot the name) in the keybaord layout options
